md:
giải nghĩa từ "relates" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Relates (verb) - có quan hệ, có liên quan
	* Meaning: to have a connection or association with something or someone.
	* Example: The new policy relates to all employees in the company.
	* Related words: connection, association, link, correlation.
2. Relates (verb) - kể lại, thuật lại
	* Meaning: to tell or narrate a story or an event.
	* Example: She relates the story of her trip to Europe with great enthusiasm.
	* Related words: tell, narrate, recount, describe.
3. Relates (verb) - có liên quan đến
	* Meaning: to be relevant or pertinent to something.
	* Example: The new research relates to the field of medicine.
	* Related words: relevant, pertinent, applicable, connected.

Note: The verb "relates" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.

  2. Relates (verb) - kể lại, thuật lại
    • Meaning: to tell or narrate a story or an event.
    • Example: She relates the story of her trip to Europe with great enthusiasm.
    • Related words: tell, narrate, recount, describe.
  3. Relates (verb) - có liên quan đến
    • Meaning: to be relevant or pertinent to something.

Note: The verb "relates" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
